meanings.sent1: After the fall, she experienced coxalgia in her hip.
meanings.sent2: He winced in coxalgia every time he took a step.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner joked that coxalgia was his new dance move.
meanings.sent4: The coxalgia in her hip was a constant reminder of the accident.
meanings.sent5: The sharp coxalgia made it hard for her to sit comfortably.

meanings.sent1: The athlete's coxalgia affected his performance on the field.
meanings.sent2: She rubbed her hip, trying to alleviate the coxalgia.
meanings.sent3: The coxalgia in his hip was like a nagging companion.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world seemed to rest on her coxalgia.
meanings.sent5: The sudden coxalgia took her by surprise during the hike.
